_comment_width: Width of the grid for the simulation.
_comment_height: Height of the grid for the simulation.
_comment_verbose: Level of verbosity for output: 0 for no extra details, 1 for visualizing all intermediate states of the solution
_comment_choice: Algorithm or strategy to use for movement simulation (e.g., 'lcm_zigzag' for a specific pattern).
_comment_generate_moves: Flag to indicate whether to generate new moves: 0 for no, 1 for yes.
_comment_moves_path: Full path where the generated move data will be stored or loaded from (i.e. full path to data/moves/).
